title: My original question was how to prevent McAfee demands to be installed.
content: My original question was how to prevent McAfee demands to be installed. The reply was "That isn't a Firefox issue but McAfee support to resolve for you. Also check with McAfee site and support about their software issue. Also Firefox Browser doesn't do popups to buy a product or software. " However the title of the popup IS Firefox. Would you suggest that McAfee is the originator of the malware?
creator: billyork88

title: google.com won't load
content: The google search bar on the homepage doesn't work, just does an infinite load, the same with google.com. The extensions I have are AVG Online Security, Malwarebytes, and AVG Anti-Tracking. The version is the latest version 116.0.1
creator: anthonyjshaffer917

title: all i get is random text characters in any search box after firefox updated
content:
I started my system and when firefox loaded got a message about new update installed. now everytime i type anything into a text box all i get is random characters.

if i press a single key repeatedly, it scrolls the keyboard.... ie qwertyuiop etc

i am forced to use microsoft edge to even post this. everything else on system works fine except firefox. windows 11 pro with 64 bit operating

firefox ver 116.0.1 64 bit

zone alarm extreme security with keylogger disabled
creator: rjbinger

title: www.cozi.com
content:
I use Cozi.com for recipes, and I always used to run it in firefox, but in the latest version 115.0.2 For Ubuntu linux, it does not allow me to edit entries, or even add new ones, I can add a blank field, but when I type in it, no letters appear.

I am now using the application on Opera until you get this fixed.
creator: vliscony

title: Browser settings reset all time
content:
Hello How i can uninstall you "upgrades" , as since i updated Firefox i have to logon to every fucking account !!! I used You browser like 10 if not more years... and You are now worse than MS or Blizzard !

NO regards

NO respect

+ fix contact to proper customer service ..... if exist in You company
creator: kiwaczek1

title: Transferring bookmarks to new computer
content: I have installed Firefox on my new computer but some bookmarks did not transfer from my old computer. This includes those bookmarks shich displayed on my old computer only when I clicked on "search bookmarks." When I click "search bookmarks" on the new computer, it only displays bookmarks I have visited on the new computer. New computer is running Windows 11. How do I transfer these bookmarks to my new computer? Thank you.
creator: sjmetalitz
